scripts.link: mkdirp ./dist/tool/node_modules && npm run link:install && npm run link:clean
scripts.link:install: pushd "dist/tool" && npm install azure-pipelines-task-lib@4.5.0 && npm install azure-pipelines-tool-lib@2.0.4 && npm install semvish@1.1.0 && npm install compare-ver@2.0.2 && npm install ini-parser@0.0.2 && popd
scripts.content:all: npm run content:task && npm run content:vsix
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run content:all && npm run link
scripts.vsix:preview: tfx extension create --extension-id AdvancedInstallerTool-Preview --root dist --output-path dist --override {\"name\":\"Preview Advanced Installer Tool Installer\", \"publisher\":\"caphyon-test\"} --rev-version
scripts.package:release: npm run build && npm run vsix:release
scripts.package:preview: npm run build && npm run vsix:preview
